text: Hello there, How are you?
Pretty good. How are you?
I'm great, thank you! I am asking you today to donate some of your task payment to the charity Save the Children.
They are a worthy charity. I will donate $1.
Thank you so much
You are welcome. I used to be a monthly donor.
That is wonderful to hear!
I didn't write to the little girl I was sponsoring nearly as much as I should have. That makes me feel bad, but hopefully I made some sort of difference in her life.
Oh my, well I am sure the times that you did write to her she was filled with joy.
I know that I enjoyed her letters.
I am sure! There is a spark that lights up in your heart when you read those little words huh?
Yes, and the knowledge that I should be more grateful for my life, because even though things can be rough, there are people who struggle more than I have.
Of coarse, and I wish more people could see it that way.
There is enough for everyone to have a good life, but there are way too many people doing without because of the greed of a few.
Yes, there are plenty of people with plenty and these children have nothing. They need more!
Yes, I hate to think of all the children suffering. It isn't right that they do without in a world of abundance.
Well I do thank you for your $1 donation and our research team will collect it and send it to the Save the Children Charity.
I appreciate that. I hope that it helps. I know every penny counts when you don't have a lot.
Yes It does! Anything that you can give makes a difference!
I'm glad. If I won the lottery and it was a huge amount, I would use it to help other people. I don't understand how having more than you need does you any good.
I know. Thank you again!
